org.springframework.boot.jta.narayana

Class NarayanaProperties

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.boot.jta.narayana.NarayanaProperties

  • @ConfigurationProperties(prefix="spring.jta.narayana")
public class NarayanaProperties
extends Object
    Subset of Narayana properties which can be configured via Spring configuration. Use jbossts-properties.xml for complete configuration.
    Since:
    1.4.0
    Author:
    Gytis Trikleris
